attributes.action: Brexit has won the referendum loud and clear say no to another referendum.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron said we will be ok out of the EU, the financial sector has stabilised if not better, the EU is now worried it will fall apart without Britain which only shows we were the back bone of this union without any control, I understand people are upset about the outcome but that doesn't mean they should have there way.
attributes.background: Britain had a referendum to leave or remain a part of the European union there was a lot of debates we heard from the politicians and the experts and in the end over 17m voters decided to leave it was fair it wasn't a close call it was loud and clear now lets end it as it is.
